plugins.name: Balance Sheet
plugins.description:
This tool will help you easily create visualisations of your balance sheets in no time at all !


Data format


Check out our playground file to see how to format your data and what can be made with the tool


Why this tool?

  • Simple to understand data, place your assets in the left 2 columns and your liabilities+equities in the right side and watch your data come to life
  • Shortcuts to quickly split your data into current and non-current categories
plugins.tagline: Visualise your Balance Sheets with ease

plugins.name: Resizer
plugins.description:
This plugin empowers you to resize multiple layers by independently setting their width, height, and constraints. Choose between fixed values, relative adjustments to the selected layer or its parent, or select from an expanding list of presets for even more flexibility.


Features

  1. Fixed values: Set specific sizes (e.g., 200).
  2. Relative to self: Use arithmetic operations (e.g., +20, -100, 5x, 1/4) to resize layers relative to their current dimensions.
  3. Relative to parent: Resize using percentages relative to the parent container (e.g., 50%).
  4. Custom options: Tailor resizing to fit unique scenarios.
  5. Familiar presets: Quickly apply predefined size options without taking your hands off the keyboard.


Custom Options

  1. Preserve width/height: Modify only one dimension.
  2. Lock aspect ratio: Adjust size while maintaining proportions.
  3. Mirror height/width: Change the orientation or inherit the opposite parameter.
  4. Fill width/height: Instantly fill the parent container.
  5. Stretch top/right/bottom/left: Resize to touch the parent container's boundaries.
  6. Minimum/Maximum among selection: Automatically set size to the smallest or largest dimension in the selection.


Known Issues

  1. Resize behavior may be unpredictable. Let me know your expectations in the comments!
  2. Search might not return expected results if you skip characters.
  3. You cannot use 0px values due to a limitation of the Figma API.
  4. The "Learn more" action is not available, yet.
  5. Some FigJam layers do not support resizing, and since the notification system is currently minimal, these layers are ignored without clear communication through the UI.


Future plans

I’m working on these updates based on your feedback. Your support, through comments, likes, or sharing, helps make these possible!

  1. Variable support: Set dimension-scoped variables for even more flexibility.
  2. Custom presets: Define your own presets.
  3. Anchor control: Adjust resizing behavior by choosing between center, top, right, bottom, or left anchor points.
  4. Improved search: Enhance search to handle cases where characters are skipped.
  5. Improved notifications: Enhance the response clarity after resizing.
plugins.tagline: Resize multiple layers instantly with fixed, relative, or custom options.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Adjust height with fixed, relative values, or available choices.

parameters.name: Constraints
parameters.description: Respect defined constraints when resizing (enabled by default).

Acessibilidade - Diretrizes e boas práticas

plugins.name: Detach components
plugins.description:
Simply select section(s), frame(s) or group(s) or single components , run the plugin and voilà components will get detached from master components including nested instances in one click!


  1. Quickly detach selected components, including nested child components.
  2. Convert Master Components to normal layers!
  3. Runs efficiently in the background, following Figma's guidelines.
  4. Receive real-time feedback with clear notifications that inform you about the number of components got detached, keeping you informed!.


This plugin is part of a series of plugins with pure focus on elevating little things we designers need! and form of giving back to the design community -xOxO

accepted.name: Mina Awadallah
accepted.description: A designer with a simple purpose!

plugins.tagline: Your ultimate tool to really get all those components detached! in one single click!

102251.description:

  3. Runs efficiently in the background, following Figma's guidelines.
  4. Receive real-time feedback with clear notifications that inform you about the number of components got detached, keeping you informed!.


This plugin is part of a series of plugins with pure focus on elevating little things we designers need! and form of giving back to the design community -xOxO
102251.release_notes:
-Changes to how the plugin handles large selections of components! 
-Simplified toast after processing 
-Now you can convert master component to normal layers!
102251.tagline: Your ultimate tool to really get all those components detached! in one single click!

plugins.name: Attributed Text Copy Helper
plugins.description:
The plugin is used to easily copy attributed text just by selecting text node.
Default use case:
When developing applications in XCode, it's fast just to copy text from design viewer and paste attributed string into storyboard/xib's UILabel/UITextField `attributedText` field.

So, how it works:
0. Start Plugin
1. Select TextNode in side navigator or on canvas
That's it, now you have attributed text from TextNode copied into your clipboard! Paste it into editors, what support that and enjoy!

That's it, now you have attributed text from TextNode copied into your clipboard! Paste it into editors, what support that and enjoy!

plugins.name: Mini Map Pro
plugins.description:
Mini Map Pro is a Figma plugin designed to enhance navigation and efficiency when working with large Figma design files. One common challenge designers face is navigating quickly to different parts of a large canvas, especially when dealing with complex projects with numerous frames and elements. Mini Map Pro addresses this issue by automatically generating a mini-map preview of the entire design.


With Mini Map Pro, users can easily view a scaled-down version of their entire Figma design and quickly click to navigate to specific areas. This feature allows designers to move seamlessly across different sections of the design, without having to manually zoom in or scroll through large files. The plugin helps improve productivity and offers a more convenient way to interact with the Figma workspace, making it an essential tool for designers working on extensive projects.


Key Features:

- Auto-Generated Design Preview: Automatically creates a mini-map of the entire Figma canvas, giving users an overview of all design elements.

- Quick Navigation: Click on the mini-map to jump directly to any section of the design, eliminating the need for cumbersome scrolling or zooming.

- Improved Workflow: Enhance your workflow by providing a clear visual context of the design layout, making it easier to locate and edit specific elements.


Use Case:

Imagine working on a complex dashboard UI with dozens of screens and components. Instead of manually searching through each frame, Mini Map Pro lets you see all frames at a glance and quickly navigate to any screen with a single click.


This plugin is ideal for designers looking to streamline their navigation process and focus more on designing rather than managing the canvas.
plugins.tagline: Navigate large Figma files effortlessly auto-generate mini-map previews for quick access

plugins.name: Data Template Generator
plugins.description:
An alternative tool to generate massive template CSV / XLSX.


This plugin can be used in the following cases:

  • Generate members card
  • Emails template images
  • Reports
  • And more...


Usage:

1. Open this plugins

2. Prepare a valid CSV / XLSX file

3. Upload to the plugin by drag-and-drop or select

4. Rename your frame text node that starts with `@` (e.g. `@name`) that match your data header

5. Select the Frame / Group that you want to duplicate

6. If all things are ready, the plugin will allow you to generate

7. Enjoy your stuff


Video demo:

Coming soon


GitHub:

https://github.com/r48n34/Data-Template-Generator
plugins.tagline: An alternative user friendly massive template generator with CSV / XLSX

plugins.name: Excel generator
plugins.description: Excel Generator for Figma is a data integration tool that allows users to upload and process Excel files (.xlsx and .xls) directly within Figma. It handles three distinct data sections (List Data, List Detail Data, and Product Detail Data) and provides real-time feedback on file processing status. The plugin features a clean, user-friendly interface with visual progress indicators and error handling, making it easy to manage and share design specifications through Excel data.
plugins.tagline: Excel meets Figma, seamlessly

139223.name: Excel generator
139223.description: Excel Generator for Figma is a data integration tool that allows users to upload and process Excel files (.xlsx and .xls) directly within Figma. It handles three distinct data sections (List Data, List Detail Data, and Product Detail Data) and provides real-time feedback on file processing status. The plugin features a clean, user-friendly interface with visual progress indicators and error handling, making it easy to manage and share design specifications through Excel data.

plugins.name: Text Highlighter
plugins.description: Transform text workflow with Text Highlighter! This plugin helps you split large text blocks into separate lines and highlight as you please. While it doesn't directly target individual words, it gets you closer by breaking text at line breaks, giving you more control over your text formatting. Perfect for creating annotated designs, presentations, and documentation where you need to highlight specific lines of text. We're not able to target what we need due to Figma's code restraints, but I think I got us closer to what so many of us are looking for. I'll continue to workshop this, and publish the code on GIT if anyone would like to assist. I hope you enjoy 1.0
plugins.tagline: Text highlighter that targets line breaks!

115841.name: Text Highlighter
115841.description: Transform text workflow with Text Highlighter! This plugin helps you split large text blocks into separate lines and highlight as you please. While it doesn't directly target individual words, it gets you closer by breaking text at line breaks, giving you more control over your text formatting. Perfect for creating annotated designs, presentations, and documentation where you need to highlight specific lines of text. We're not able to target what we need due to Figma's code restraints, but I think I got us closer to what so many of us are looking for. I'll continue to workshop this, and publish the code on GIT if anyone would like to assist. I hope you enjoy 1.0
115841.tagline: Text highlighter that targets line breaks!

plugins.name: Icon AI
plugins.description:
IconAI


Create custom icons effortlessly with AI directly in Figma! Enter a prompt, and the plugin generates a unique icon that you can export as an SVG right into your project. Currently free in Beta, this plugin also saves each icon in your history for quick access and reuse.


Future updates will add exciting new features:


  1. Google Login/Signup: Seamlessly access and save your icon history across devices.
  2. Advanced AI: Enjoy even more precise and creative icon generation for your prompts.
  3. Customization Options: Set icon size, color, and quantity to match your design needs.
  4. Image Upload: Upload reference images to guide the AI for even closer matches.
  5. Icon Set Creation: Group icons into cohesive sets for efficient design workflows.
  6. Web Version: Access the plugin from a web interface for an enhanced experience.


Ideal for designers seeking fast, customizable icon generation right within Figma. Take advantage of the free Beta to see how it can transform your workflow!
plugins.tagline: Generate custom icons with AI directly in Figma

108844.name: Icon AI
108844.description:

Create custom icons effortlessly with AI directly in Figma! Enter a prompt, and the plugin generates a unique icon that you can export as an SVG right into your project. Currently free in Beta, this plugin also saves each icon in your history for quick access and reuse.


Future updates will add exciting new features:


  1. Google Login/Signup: Seamlessly access and save your icon history across devices.
  2. Advanced AI: Enjoy even more precise and creative icon generation for your prompts.
  3. Customization Options: Set icon size, color, and quantity to match your design needs.
  4. Image Upload: Upload reference images to guide the AI for even closer matches.
  5. Icon Set Creation: Group icons into cohesive sets for efficient design workflows.
  6. Web Version: Access the plugin from a web interface for an enhanced experience.


Ideal for designers seeking fast, customizable icon generation right within Figma. Take advantage of the free Beta to see how it can transform your workflow!
108844.tagline: Generate custom icons with AI directly in Figma

plugins.name: kofferX - Asset Management and Automations
plugins.description:
🪄 tldr:


kofferX streamlines and automates manual tasks such as Dev <> Design Asset Management, Custom Icons and S3 Handling, Token Management, and Review Processes within Figma. Created by designers and developers who understand the pain of manual work, kofferX simplifies collaboration, allowing you to focus on your craft and create amazing products faster.




🤔 What is kofferX?


At kofferX, we eliminate the manual tasks you dread, streamlining asset and token management to enhance your workflow. We understand that handling assets impacts multiple teams, and we're here to simplify those processes for you.


We realize the chores in handling assets and that just doesn't affect one team, but multiple teams:


  1. Design <> Design: Custom icons and illustrations often require frequent asset requests from your team. kofferX simplifies this process.
  2. Dev <> Dev: S3 management and repetitive campaign banner code updates can be tedious. kofferX streamlines these tasks with code and template automation.
  3. Design <> Growth <> Dev: Collaboration becomes trickier with more stakeholders involved. kofferX ensures effective collaboration and integration, keeping everyone in the loop.



⚡️ What all do we offer?


  1. Create Projects and workspaces with access control
  2. Figma to direct S3 uploads to kofferX, just copy link in your favorite format (WEBP, PNG, JPG, SVG)
  3. Get optimized assets with WEBP format conversion on the go.
  4. Create Asset Collections for your campaigns, custom icons, etc.
  5. Plugin Asset Library is a simple drag <> Drop to your fav asset to Figma canvas, whenever you need. (Imagine your own brand library or icon library across teams!)
  6. Replace Assets with new chagnes anytime over the older ones, or restore your past iterations ;)
  7. Compare and review your old to latest asset changes and log them.
  8. Add Tags and keep track of your assets from Plugin/System.



😎 Why kofferX should be a part of your team?


  1. Seamless Integration: kofferX blends effortlessly into your team's existing workflow, staying invisible while enhancing productivity.
  2. Focus on Productivity: Allows your team to use their everyday tools without disruptions, enabling them to work faster and more efficiently. Say no to chores!
  3. Enhanced Collaboration: Eliminates the need for Gdrive, Slack, and WhatsApp, streamlining communication and processes.
  4. Campaign Power: kofferX optimizes your workflows, helping you stay in the loop and power your campaigns effectively.



We are still early and constantly hearing feedback from our users. We are sure kofferX will keep your team pipelines in check without affecting existing codebase or structure. We will soon release our pricing plan and you will love it more as you use. We have something big coming in line for our users and our commitment to it will solve this hassle between teams to improve design -> delivery processes.

For any queries, we are prompt to reply instantly here: dm.new/kofferX


🛣️ Roadmap


  1. Design <> Marketing: Design Reviews and Slack Thread is never ending. Managing Google Drive, Whatsapp, Slack to find design_final_final won't be an issue with kofferX.
  2. Design <> Dev: Exporting assets in webp, and S3 cloud, and then back to codebase with asset link is lot of hassle. This pain gets 10x to make changes and update each thing everytime. Token management is painful story for another day, but know this, we directly sync with your Github and no hefty pricing.


and it goes on and on 🦆...


You can know more about us here: www.kofferx.com
plugins.tagline: Automate manual chores like Asset Management, Token Management and Review process!

plugins.description: This plugin can be used to quickly move a batch selection of layers outside of their direct parents. This is especially useful when working with components where you have accidentally grouped things incorrectly and want to simplify the component all at once!

plugins.name: Variables to JSON
plugins.description:
Variables to JSON Plugin

Easily convert Figma variables into structured JSON code, fully compatible with Style Dictionary Configurator.


Features:

✅ Export all variable collections into a single JSON file.

✅ Supports all variable types: Color, Number, String, and Boolean.

✅ Generate correct values for "Font Family, Font Weight, Opacity, Boolean"

✅ Support Variables Modes or Themes

plugins.name: Aspect ratio frames
plugins.description:
🖼 A tool that helps you calculate aspect ratios and create frames with the values you specify. It also allows you to resize the frame.


⚙️ Features

- Aspect ratio calculation: This plugin presets the most common aspect ratios used in various design systems, and allows you to convert the width and height.

- Create frame: It also allows you to create a frame with the value you specify and name the frame with the associated value.

- Reverse value: You can also reverse the value.
plugins.tagline: A tool to help you create frames in aspect ratio and resize.

93467.name: Aspect ratio frames
93467.description:
🖼 A tool that helps you calculate aspect ratios and create frames with the values you specify. It also allows you to resize the frame.

- Reverse value: You can also reverse the value.
93467.tagline: A tool to help you create frames in aspect ratio and resize.

plugins.name: NavJam
plugins.description:
NavJam is a versatile navigation and utility plugin for Figma and FigJam, meticulously designed to streamline your workflow and optimize interaction with large boards.


With NavJam, you can tailor your navigation experience with three plugin sizes, ranging from simple back-and-forth navigation to the full power of a dynamic minimap.


Key Features:


Powerful Search: Quickly locate and zoom into specific components or areas of your board.

Dynamic Minimap: Get an overhead view of your entire board and navigate effortlessly with a single click.

Back and Forward Buttons: Easily navigate through your viewing history for quick access to previous focus areas.


NEW! Enhanced QR Code Generator!

Automatically populate QR code text from selected nodes or frames.

Customize with URLs, additional text, sizes, colors, and error correction levels.


NEW Logo Support: Upload and save custom logos to embed directly into your QR codes for future use, making personalization fast and easy.

Save default QR code settings for quicker reuse.

Generate, preview, and add QR codes to your canvas with a single click or double-click.

Even if the QR code isn’t for Figma/FigJam, NavJam makes generating custom QR codes a breeze for any purpose.


We'd love to hear your feedback and suggestions for new features to make NavJam even more powerful—let us know how we can improve your experience!
plugins.tagline: Boost productivity in Figma & FigJam with advanced navigation tools, a minimap, and a search feature

107109.name: NavJam
107109.description:
NavJam is a versatile navigation and utility plugin for Figma and FigJam, meticulously designed to streamline your workflow and optimize interaction with large boards.


With NavJam, you can tailor your navigation experience with three plugin sizes, ranging from simple back-and-forth navigation to the full power of a dynamic minimap.


Key Features:


Powerful Search: Quickly locate and zoom into specific components or areas of your board.

Dynamic Minimap: Get an overhead view of your entire board and navigate effortlessly with a single click.

Back and Forward Buttons: Easily navigate through your viewing history for quick access to previous focus areas.


NEW! Enhanced QR Code Generator!

Automatically populate QR code text from selected nodes or frames.

Customize with URLs, additional text, sizes, colors, and error correction levels.


NEW Logo Support: Upload and save custom logos to embed directly into your QR codes for future use, making personalization fast and easy.

Save default QR code settings for quicker reuse.

Generate, preview, and add QR codes to your canvas with a single click or double-click.

Even if the QR code isn’t for Figma/FigJam, NavJam makes generating custom QR codes a breeze for any purpose.


We'd love to hear your feedback and suggestions for new features to make NavJam even more powerful—let us know how we can improve your experience!
107109.release_notes:
🔧 Update Alert: We’ve squashed a pesky bug that occasionally caused the wrong buttons to display in specific scenarios. Navigating between different plugin functions should now feel much smoother, making it easier for you to get where you need to go.

Also, we’re always here to improve your experience, so if you notice anything off in the future, please don’t hesitate to let us know—we’re all ears!

📢 Feature Suggestions Welcome: We’d love to hear any ideas or improvements you’d like to see in the plugin. Whether it’s a small tweak or a brand-new feature, your feedback is invaluable to us!
107109.tagline: Boost productivity in Figma & FigJam with advanced navigation tools, a minimap, and a search feature

plugins.name: Responsive Table
plugins.description:
Release Notes: Responsive Table Converter v1.0

We're excited to announce the release of the Responsive Table Converter plugin for Figma! This powerful tool allows you to transform standard web tables into mobile-friendly tables with repeated headers, making your designs more responsive and user-friendly.


Key Features:

Easy Conversion: Quickly convert web tables to mobile-optimized tables with repeated headers.

Improved Readability: Enhance the readability of tables on mobile devices.

Seamless Integration: Works directly within your Figma design workflow.

Efficient Workflow: Save time and ensure consistency in your responsive designs.

Instructions to Use Responsive Table Converter


Design Header Cells:

Create the header cells for your table.

Set a fixed width and height for each header cell.

Arrange the header cells in a horizontal auto layout.


Design Row Cells:

Create the row cells in the same manner as the header cells.

Set a fixed width and height for each row cell.

Arrange the row cells in a horizontal auto layout.


Group Header Cells:

Select all the header cells.

Group them and name the group "Head".


Group Row Cells:

Select all the row cells.

Group them and name the group "Row".


Group the Table:

Select the "Head" and "Row" groups.

Group them together and set the auto layout to vertical.


Repeat the Rows:

Duplicate the "Row" group as many times as needed to create your table rows.


Select the Frame:

Select the frame containing your table.


Use the Plugin:

Run the Responsive Table Converter plugin.

The plugin will convert your table to a mobile-friendly format with repeated header
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly transform tables for seamless mobile viewing.

94982.name: Responsive Table
94982.description:

plugins.name: Copalette
plugins.description:
Copalette is for generating color palettes based on primary colors


Usage

  1. choose the color you want
  2. Name your color
  3. Set the number of colors you want to generate from the main color
  4. Set your circle if you want (optional) suggested default settings
  5. Set circle spacing if you want (optional) suggested default setting
  6. The last step choose horizontal or vertical orientation
  7. Then press the generate button


Enjoy!

designwitharifin🖖

31296.description:

plugins.name: Perceptual Color Adjustment
plugins.description:
Stay in the creative flow by making immediate perceptual color adjustments to any selection in real-time!

🌈

Most color tools I have used take you "out of flow" because they're overly complicated to use. I wanted something that was much more free with results that were immediate. I wrote this plugin to enable "immediacy" that keeps creatives in their flow, and allows quick generative and iterative design.

🌈

Works on all layer types that support color or images!

Change the color of:

  1. Fills (all types including image fills)
  2. Strokes
  3. Effects
  4. Text and text ranges
  5. Images (turn on in settings)
  6. Illustrations

🌈

You can also insert starter templates onto the Figma canvas at the click of a button, there are currently two:

  1. Create Color Wheel — Create a perceptually uniform color wheel that has 360 hues that you can easily adjust with the plugin
  2. Create Color Scale — Create a Color Scale based on perceptual luminance. Start here and adjust to create beautiful color themes for your design.

🌈
plugins.tagline: Make relative color adjustments to a selection —  fills, strokes, text, images, and effects!

99369.name: Perceptual Color Adjustment
99369.description:
Stay in the creative flow by making immediate perceptual color adjustments to any selection in real-time!

🌈

plugins.name: Image Brightness Analyzer
plugins.description:
Enhance the readability of your images with the Brightness Analyzer plugin. This tool calculates the average brightness of any image, providing recommendations for optimal overlay use to ensure your text stands out. Whether you’re designing for web, print, or social media, this plugin helps you achieve perfect contrast for maximum legibility.


🌞 Features


  1. Accurate Brightness Calculation: Uses an algorithm to determine the average brightness of your images.
  2. Overlay Recommendations: Suggests the best overlay color and opacity to improve text readability.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive design for quick and efficient use.
  4. Seamless Integration: Works flawlessly within your Figma workflow.


🚀 Usage Instructions


  1. Upload your image to the plugin.
  2. Instantly receive the average brightness percentage.
  3. Get recommendations for the best overlay to use.
  4. Apply the suggested overlay to enhance text visibility.


Why Use Brightness Analyzer?


Ensuring your text is readable over images can be challenging. The Brightness Analyzer plugin simplifies this process by providing you with clear, actionable recommendations based on the brightness of your image. Say goodbye to guesswork and ensure your designs always have the perfect contrast.


Made with 🌞 by Rodolphe
plugins.tagline: Optimize your image's readability

96135.description:

plugins.name: Simple Stripes
plugins.description:
Simple Stripes - Create striped patterns with ease

A simple way to create a striped pattern that is fast, customizable, and easy to visualize.


Features:

  1. 🎨 Fully Customizable: Add as many colors as you want, reorder them, adjust size and angle.
  2. 👀 Live preview: See changes in real-time as you tweak your design.
  3. ✍️ Editable output: Each stripe is created with a parent component, so you can make edits to the pattern even after the plugin is closed.


If you run into any issues or have suggestions, please contact me at kwandy.com/contact. I'd also really appreciate if you could leave a comment on what you think 🙂
plugins.tagline: Create striped patterns with customizable colors, thicknesses, and angles.

plugins.name: Frame Sequencer
plugins.description:
FrameSequencer is a Figma plugin that allows you to reorder multiple selected frames in a Z-pattern without changing their positions, and rename them with sequential numbers.


選択した複数のフレームを、見た目の位置は変えないまま、Zの字順に重ね順とフレーム名を変更します。01,02,03...という連続した番号で一気にすべてのフレームをリネームします。資料作成で役立ちます。
plugins.tagline: Reorder, rename, and organize your frames in a Z-pattern with FrameSequencer.

130141.tagline: Reorder, rename, and organize your frames in a Z-pattern with FrameSequencer.

plugins.name: figma-publish-notice
plugins.description:
1. If the figma file is changed, the designer can manually click the publish button of the plugin to trigger a notification.
  2. you need to provide a callback url. when designer click the publish button, the plugins will request the callback url.
  3. The parameter of the callback url is desc, which means this change.
  4. The callback url http method is "get".

37793.name: figma-publish-notice

1. If the figma file is changed, the designer can manually click the publish button of the plugin to trigger a notification.
  2. you need to provide a callback url. when designer click the publish button, the plugins will request the callback url.
  3. The parameter of the callback url is desc, which means this change.
  4. The callback url http method is "get".

plugins.name: Design to Doc
plugins.description:
Streamline your design-to-development workflow with the AI-Powered Design-to-Doc Plugin. This tool analyzes your Figma designs to extract and document key details like typography, color palettes, spacing, icons, and layout properties—all in one place. Designed for both designers and developers, it ensures accuracy, saves time, and simplifies collaboration by providing well-structured documentation. Whether you’re building a design system, preparing for developer handoff, or optimizing your workflow, this plugin makes the process efficient and error-free.


Key Features:


Automatically analyze all artboards, frames, and components.

Generate detailed documentation for text styles, colors, and spacing.

Export as Markdown, HTML, or Word Document.

Perfect for creating consistent design systems and seamless handoffs.


Empower your design and development team to work smarter, not harder!


Watch how-to video here: https://youtu.be/pqlnDFb8vEU?si=qFgNzNabPBP3lQAe
plugins.tagline: Design Smarter, Document Faster

plugins.name: Variables to styled-components GlobalStyle
plugins.description: The Figma Variables to styled-components GlobalStyle plugin allows designers and developers to export Figma local variables for seamless integration into their front-end projects. The plugin exports Figma local variables as CSS custom properties for styled-components GlobalStyle, providing developers with an efficient way to access and utilize the design tokens in their front-end code.
plugins.tagline: Export your local variables to CSS custom properties inside styled-components GlobalStyle

plugins.name: Skeleton Text Converter
plugins.description: This plugin converts your text layers into skeleton rectangles that simulate content loading or placeholders. With adjustable options for corner radius, color, height, and even randomized widths, this plugin lets you quickly create wireframes or design skeleton screens with ease. Simply select your text, customize your settings, and watch it transform into a polished skeleton layout.
plugins.tagline: Quickly convert live text to skeleton placeholder

119731.name: Skeleton Text Converter

Simply select your text, customize your settings, and watch it transform into a polished skeleton layout.
119731.tagline: Quickly convert live text to skeleton placeholder

plugins.name: WCAG Color Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Select any element with a background and foreground fill from your Figma design, and the plugin will:

  1. Check if colors meet accessibility standards (WCAG AA and AAA)
  2. Provide accessible color suggestions while maintaining your design's aesthetics
  3. Guide you through text size and UI component requirements
  4. Explain accessibility concepts in clear, simple terms


Perfect for:

  1. Designers checking design accessibility
  2. Teams working on compliant user interfaces
  3. Anyone wanting to make their designs more inclusive


Features:

  1. Real-time contrast analysis
  2. Smart color suggestions
  3. Educational guidance on WCAG standards
  4. Easy-to-understand results and recommendations


This tool helps ensure your designs are not just beautiful, but accessible to all users.
plugins.tagline: Color accessibility and smart color suggestions

plugins.name: Air App
plugins.description:
Welcome to the world of the Air Figma plugin! This plugin allows quick, seamless transfer of files between your Air workspace and the Figma file you are working in.


You’ll be able to browse your boards and libraries to find an asset to drop into your design. Once you’re done creating, export your work right back to Air to keep it organized.


How it works:

  1. Sign up for Air if you haven’t already
  2. Upload and organize your content in your workspace
  3. Install the Air Plugin in Figma
  4. Drop relevant assets into your design files
  5. Export creative work back to Air


For support or further questions, reach out to help@air.inc any time!
plugins.tagline: Drop files from Air into Figma and vice versa!

117018.name: Air App
117018.description:
Welcome to the world of the Air Figma plugin! This plugin allows quick, seamless transfer of files between your Air workspace and the Figma file you are working in.


You’ll be able to browse your boards and libraries to find an asset to drop into your design. Once you’re done creating, export your work right back to Air to keep it organized.


How it works:

  1. Sign up for Air if you haven’t already
  2. Upload and organize your content in your workspace
  3. Install the Air Plugin in Figma
  4. Drop relevant assets into your design files
  5. Export creative work back to Air


For support or further questions, reach out to help@air.inc any time!
117018.tagline: Drop files from Air into Figma and vice versa!

plugins.name: RGB Color Picker
plugins.description:
An RGB color picker is a tool that allows you to choose a color by adjusting the amount of red, green, and blue light in the mix. RGB stands for Red, Green, and Blue, which are the primary colors of light. By combining these colors in various proportions, you can create a wide range of different colors.


There are two main types of RGB color pickers:


Interactive pickers: These are digital tools that you can use on a computer or mobile device. They typically have a color wheel or sliders that you can use to adjust the red, green, and blue values. The picker will display the resulting color in real-time, allowing you to fine-tune your selection.

Predefined pickers: These are static charts or lists that display a range of RGB color values and their corresponding colors. You can select a color from the chart by finding the one that matches your desired shade.

RGB color pickers are widely used in various applications, including:


Graphic design: For selecting colors for logos, illustrations, and other visual elements.

Web design: To define the colors used for text, backgrounds, and other website elements.

Image editing: To adjust the colors in photos or create digital art.

accepted.name: Color Creator
accepted.description:
This page would be your one-stop shop for all things UI/UX creativity and a treasure trove of tools to elevate your designs.

www.beforepost.com

plugins.tagline: A color wheel is a circular representation of colors, typically made up of 12 hues.

plugins.name: Figma Variable Macros
plugins.description:
Variable Formula

Ever find yourself needing a bit of magic to implement layout values calculated from design tokens? Wondering how you can maintain your design intent in these situations? Variable Formula is the solution: They enable computation from your design tokens, ensuring your design intent remains steadfast and clear.


Variable Printf

Tired of the exhausting task of documenting design tokens on Figma? Finding it painful to display raw values and maintain synchronization? It's time to bring in a tried-and-true method. Welcome the age-old 'printf' into your Figma workflow, one-click display synchronization of design token values.


https://github.com/malangcat/figma-variable-macros
plugins.tagline: Supercharge Figma with Variable Macros
